sentences.en: "Elizabeth R", a TV portrait of the Queen, had record viewing figures.
sentences.cn: 关于女王的电视专题片《伊丽莎白女王》创下了收视纪录。

sentences.en: At 18, Victoria was crowned queen (= officially became ruler ).
Chefs at the St James Court restaurant have cooked for the Queen.
sentences.cn: 圣詹姆斯皇家饭店的厨师们曾经为女王烹制菜肴。

sentences.en: He gave his imitation of Queen Elizabeth's royal wave.
sentences.cn: 他模仿伊丽莎白女王挥手致意。

sentences.en: He was knighted in the Queen's birthday honours list in June 1988.
sentences.cn: 他于1988年6月被封为爵士，是女王生日宴会上的受勋者之一。

sentences.en: He was underwhelmed by the prospect of meeting the Queen.
sentences.cn: 即将见到女王并没让他兴奋不已。

sentences.en: I don't want to be treated like a cosseted movie queen.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意被人当作是个娇纵惯了的电影皇后。

sentences.en: In her dying days the old Queen unbent a little.
sentences.cn: 在临死的那些日子里，年迈的女王态度稍缓和了一些。

sentences.en: Lucian Freud has been asked to paint a portrait of the Queen.
sentences.cn: 卢西恩·弗洛伊德已受邀为女王画肖像画。

sentences.en: queens it over the whole family.
She is a direct descendant of Queen Victoria.
sentences.cn: 她是维多利亚女王的嫡系后代。

sentences.en: She was surely the most distinguished queen consort we have had.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问她是我们拥有的最为出众的王后。

sentences.en: The Queen unveiled a commemorative plaque.
The Queen was determined to show it was business as usual.
sentences.cn: 女王决定表现出一切正常的样子。

sentences.en: Then came the presentation of the awards by the Queen Mother.
We were taught how to curtsy to the Queen.
sentences.cn: 有人教我们如何向女王行屈膝礼。

phrases.tran_cn: 选美大赛王后，第一美女
戏剧女皇；喜欢小题大做的人
n. 五月皇后（被选为五朔节庆祝活动女王的少女）
奎因·莱提法（知名女演员）

trans.tran_cn: 女王，王后，杰出女性，（纸牌中的）王后， （国际象棋中的）后
trans.tran_en: a playing card with a picture of a queen on it

trans.tran_cn: 立…为王后（或女王），使…成为国王的妻子，[国际象棋]使（兵）成为后
